::DrillBit::

DrillBit finished the reprograming, of the protoform in the pod. He
activated the DNA scanner. He just hoped there was something for it to
lock on to. 
"Pull back, Maximals. Or be destroyed!" He said, shooting at Triceradon,
again.

::Predicon Base::

The auto-guns continued to fire.
